pages.title: Datacenter Port
pages.text: The Datacenter Port is the primary input/output interface for the $(l:logicore:architecture/datacenter)Datacenter$() multiblock structure. It allows you to extract the immense computational power generated by the structure.

pages.title: Placement
pages.text: This block must be placed as part of the Datacenter's walls. Once the structure is formed, the Port will become active.$(br)$(br)Connect $(l:logicore:components/data_cable)Data Cables$() to this port to distribute the generated $(l:logicore:architecture/cycles)Cycles$() to your network.

pages.title: Capacity
pages.text: Unlike standard machines, the Port has direct access to the Datacenter's massive internal buffer.$(br)$(br)Multiple ports can be installed on a single structure to increase the total throughput or to create separate sub-networks.
A high-bandwidth interface module for massive data transfer.
